data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Groningen take a 0-1 lead thanks to Wessel Dammers.
In the minute 36, Lennart Thy grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Dirk Abels with an assist there.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Jorgen Strand Larsen.
Ahmed El Messaoudi instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 67, Henk Fraser is making the team's first substitution at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel with Mario Engels replacing Bryan Smeets.
Reda Kharchouch is on a sub for Sven Mijnans for Sparta.
Mica Pinto (Sparta) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 73, The away team replace Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist with Sam Schreck.
Goal! Jorgen Strand Larsen extends Groningen's lead to 1-3.
Great play from Gabriel Gudmundsson to set up the goal.
In the minute 76, Tom Beugelsdijk is replacing Michael Heylen for the home team.
Wouter Burger is replacing Deroy Duarte for Sparta at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Henk Fraser (Sparta) is making a fifth substitution, with Aaron Meijers replacing Mica Pinto.
In the minute 80, Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 2-3 through a strike by Wouter Burger. .
That's a fine assist from Mario Engels.
Groningen make their second substitution with Miguel angel Leal replacing Damil Dankerlui.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Daniel van Kaam with Tomas Suslov. This is the third substitution made today by Danny Buijs.
Danny Makkelie blows to end the match. The final score is 2-3.
Thijs Dallinga is replacing Jorgen Strand Larsen for Groningen at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
